# Blessing of Bahamut (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 31

*You hear a distant dragon’s roar that no one else detects, and your skin takes on a platinum sheen.*

You gain damage reduction 10/magic for the spell’s duration.

*Material Component:* A canary feather, which is flung into the air.
